params.owner: address to calculate claimable rewards for

returns._0: the amount of rewards that could be claimed by the caller

params.owner: address to check the score of

returns.eligibleScore: score that is currently eligible for rewards
returns.totalScore: score that will be elgible for rewards next epoch

params.capital: the change in gfi holdings, denominated in USDC
params.gfi: the change in gfi holdings, denominated in GFI

returns.score: resulting score for the member given the GFI and capital changes

returns.eligibleTotal: sum of all member scores that are currently eligible
returns.nextEpochTotal: sum of all member scores that will be eligible next epoch

ExpTooLarge(int256).notice: Thrown when exp is given too large of an argument

LnNonRealResult(int256).notice: Thrown when the natural log would have returned a number outside of ℝ

LnTooLarge(int256).notice: Thrown when the natural log function is given too large of an argument

claimableRewards(address).notice: Check how many rewards are claimable for the caller. The return  value here is how much would be retrieved by calling `collectRewards`.

collectRewards(address).notice: Collect all membership yield enhancements for the caller.

consumeDeposit(address).notice: Notify that the owner has deposited some assets, which  may affect membership.

consumeWithdraw(address).notice: Notify that the owner has withdrawn some assets, which  may affect membership.

estimateMemberScore(address,int256,int25.notice: Estimate the score for an existing member, given some changes in GFI and capital

totalMemberScores().notice: Get the sum of all member scores that are currently eligible and that will be eligible next epoch
